text: @globalnews Why is the government so inept. @JustinTrudeau They are willing to spend 28 billion to fight Covid19 but can't spend a penny to setup supervised quarantine sights for Canadians who return to the country. I forgot the stat but was it 80% of cases are from ppl who just traveled.
